Description: The following statement contains a magic number: this                 .WhenAnyValue(x => x.ItemAppearing)                 .Select(item =>                 {                     int offset = -1;                      var itemIndex = Movies.IndexOf(item);                     if (itemIndex == Movies.Count - 8)                     {                         offset = Movies.Count;                     }                      return offset;                 })                 .Where(index => index > 0)                 .InvokeCommand(LoadMovies);
